title: feat: allow ^ versions for miscellaneous packages

body:
## PR Checklist

- [x] Addresses an existing open issue: fixes #5114 _(part of it)_
- [x] That issue was marked as [`status: accepting prs`](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22status%3A+accepting+prs%22)
- [x] Steps in [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) were taken

## Overview

Adds a `^` range to the following packages that didn't match any of the other groups:

* `debug`: new minor version available, `4.3.5` _(released the same day as this PR, amusing coincidental timing!)_
* `diff`: new minor versions available, up to `5.2.0`
* `ms`: latest version; hasn't been updated in 3 years
* `workerpool`: new minor versions available, up to `6.5.1`

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/68424764/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/68424764)

coverage: 94.38%. remained the same
when pulling **d2ef37fa152afe1d12f0a92987f0f922bc72dc86 on JoshuaKGoldberg:minor-versions-miscellaneous-packages**
into **514b83ff9b7048130faaff3479882fa0819830e2 on mochajs:main**.
